pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可消费的；排出的；不重复使用的；可牺牲的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指上学、求医以及找律师等付的费用，还可指会费、借书费等。
常指实际支付的费用总数额，有时也指钱的花费。
指商品在市场出售的价格，尤指卖方对商品所提出的单价。比喻意义指付出的代价。
指提供服务时索取的费用，也指货物的价格、价钱。
侧重指旅行时所付的车、船费等费用。
指生产某东西的成本，也泛指商品的价格，可与price换用。

bilingual.target: 你能用现金支付这笔费用吗？

bilingual.source: This expense will be recorded as a debit.
bilingual.target: 这笔费用将被记入借方。

bilingual.source: I stapled the receipts to the expense report.
bilingual.target: 我将收据装订在费用报告上。

bilingual.source: The expense of living in the city is quite high.
bilingual.target: 在城市生活的费用相当高。

bilingual.source: I need a receipt to reimburse this expense.
bilingual.target: 我需要一张发票来报销这笔费用。

bilingual.source: This expense is unnecessary and can be saved.
bilingual.target: 这项费用是不必要的，可以省下来。

bilingual.source: The business had to write-off the loss as an expense.
bilingual.target: 企业不得不将损失注销为费用。

bilingual.source: Make sure to attach the receipt to your expense report.
bilingual.target: 确保在你的费用报告中附上收据。

bilingual.source: He submitted his expense report to the finance department.
bilingual.target: 他向财务部门提交了他的费用报告。

bilingual.source: My credit card balance is not enough to cover this expense.
bilingual.target: 我的信用卡余额不足以支付这笔费用。

list.abstract: expense（[ɪkˈspens]），英语单词，作名词为代价；价钱；费用。作动词为把…作为开支勾销；把…记入费用账户。短语搭配有at great expense（以巨大的代价）。例句为“It benefits employers at the expense of employees.（它以牺牲雇员为代价使雇主受益。）” expense名词类近义词有consumption、losing等。形容词形式为expensive，名词形式为expensiveness，复数为expenses。第三人称单数为expenses。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know anybody else who would appreciate an all-expense-paid spa weekend at a four-star resort in Big Sur?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你认识其他会想去费用全包的大苏四星酒店spa周末游的人吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I know. On our expense report, I listed it as "Eduardo," My Colombian lab assistant. So this is it? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对啊。我在实验室费用报告里，把它称为"爱德华多" ，我的哥伦比亚人实验助理。就是这个了吧 ？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you think it can be prevented by a young woman of inferior birth whose own sister's elopement resulted in a scandalously patched-up marriage only achieved at the expense of your uncle?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但忽然冒出来了个出身卑贱，门户低微的小妮子从中作梗？何况你的妹妹与人私奔的结果是一门令人感到可耻的，破碎的婚事，还要用舅舅的钱来支付婚事费用。

yingyinNormal.en: You can get your training at someone else's expense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要想受训，就麻烦别人去。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you want to protect your power at the expense of the patients. I want to protect the patients at the expense of my power.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，你想保护你的权力不惜牺牲你的病患，而我想牺牲我的权力去保护病患。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, infrastructure and logistical supplies for your troops, we can add that expense as ancillary support.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至于你方军队的基础设施建设和后勤，我们可以把支出算到外围设施上。

yingyinNormal.en: He hadn't taken my side about the tree, he'd thrown away my eggs and he made fun of me at my uncle's expense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 砍树的时候他没站住我这边，他扔掉我的鸡蛋，他还开我伯伯的玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: The Capitol has spared no expense. A new training center. New Tribute living quarters. And of course, a very special arena.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国会区一点都没有省钱，全新的训练中心，全新的贡品居住地，当然，还有一个特别设计的游戏场地。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Amy enjoys knitting her own sweaters, so I was thinking of getting her an all-expense-paid trip to the Wisconsin Sheep and Wool Festival.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米喜欢自己织毛衣，我在想自掏腰包赞助她去参加威斯康辛州羊及羊毛节。

yingyinNormal.en: As is the tradition, I have prepared a series of disrespectful jokes which generate humor at Howard's expense. Prepare to have your ribs tickled...
yingyinNormal.zh: 按照传统习惯，我准备了一些无礼的笑话，来取笑霍华德，娱乐大众，准备笑到肚子疼吧……

yingyinNormal.en: What? Of course, I would. No, you wouldn't. You would've been too busy looking at the leggy blondes, the ones who can smell an expense account at 40 paces.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当然会看了。你不会的，你早就忙着看那些金发大长腿去了。那些从四十步外就能嗅到金子味的女人。

yingyinNormal.en: Like a business manager? No, absolutely not. You can't afford to hire someone who'll forbid you from spending your money on foolish expenses. That is a foolish expense, and I forbid it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如理财经理吗？不，当然不行。你请不起一名会禁止你花钱在白痴开销上的人。因为那也是白痴开销，而我禁止你这么做。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 花费；支出；开支；经费；费用；使用；用；花
n. 代价；价钱；费用；开销；花费；需要花钱的东西

examination_example.sentence: But both these criteria would be at the <highlight>expense</highlight> of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这两个标准都将以时间为代价。

examination_example.sentence: High CEO pay is not some kind of depredation at the <highlight>expense</highlight> of the rest of the company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首席执行官的高薪不是以牺牲公司其他人的利益为代价的掠夺。

examination_example.sentence: While climate is a key element, Moritz says, it shouldn't come at the <highlight>expense</highlight> of the rest of the equation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫里茨说，虽然气候是一个关键因素，但它不应该以其他因素为代价。

sense_info_list.en: the cost required for something; the money spent on something

examination_example.sentence: Among the most popular ways they are doing is by reducing their overall <highlight>expenses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中最受欢迎的方法是减少他们的总开支。

examination_example.sentence: It reported a net loss of $5.6 billion for fiscal 2016, the 10th straight year its <highlight>expenses</highlight> have exceeded revenue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国邮政管理局报告成，2016年财政净亏损56亿美元，连续第10年支出超过收入。

word_usage.usage:
expense指“费用；价钱”时是不可数名词。例：
The garden was transformed at great expense .
花园改建花了一大笔费用。

expense指“开支；花费；费用”时多用复数。例：
living/household/medical expenses 
生活费用；家庭开支；医疗费用

expense指“花钱的东西；开销”时，多用单数。例：
Running a car is a big expense.
养一辆车开销很大。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 表示“费用；花费；开支”，常指为某物实际支付的金额总数，也可指各种花费，指金钱，也可包括时间、精力等。
表示“价格；定价；价钱”，主要指卖主给商品定的价格，一般都高于成本，也引申为做某事而付出的代价。
表示“成本；费用；价钱”，多指对要价的支付。
表示“费用；价钱”，指卖主或服务者为自己的服务或商品索要的价钱、报酬。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 花费；支出；开支；经费；费用；使用；用；花
n. 代价；价钱；费用；开销；花费；需要花钱的东西

sense_info_list.en: the cost required for something; the money spent on something
the costs incurred in the performance of one's job or a specific task, especially one undertaken for another person

examination_example.sentence: Data on management <highlight>expenses</highlight> at the college system and in other state departments will be part of a "business justification".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学系统和其他州立部门的管理费用数据将成为“商业理由”的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: On many occasions, the entrepreneurs reported not paying themselves a wage at all initially in order to cover salaries and <highlight>expenses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多情况下，创业者报告称，最初根本没有为自己支付工资，以支付薪水和开支。

examination_example.sentence: Getting ahead financially requires a reduction of spending, so that income is greater than <highlight>expenses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在财务上取得成功需要减少支出，这样收入就大于支出。

examination_example.sentence: They take pop stars as their idols, seeking every chance to meet them in person at great <highlight>expenses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把流行音乐歌星当成偶像，不惜一切代价寻找与他们见面的机会。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提供服务时索取的费用, 也指货物的价格、价钱。
指生产某东西的成本, 也泛指商品的价格, 可与 price 换用。
常指实际支付的费用总数额, 有时也指钱的花费。
侧重指旅行时所付的车、船费等费用。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提供服务时索取的费用，也指货物的价格、价钱。
指生产某东西的成本，也泛指商品的价格，可与 price 换用。
常指实际支付的费用总数额，有时也指钱的花费。
侧重指旅行时所付的车、船费等费用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 花费不多的；便宜的

word_family.mean: n. 代价；价钱；费用；开销；花费；需要花钱的东西

sense_info_list.en: the cost required for something; the money spent on something

examination_example.sentence: And his dad, Albert, took the money my dad earned and used it to pay family <highlight>expenses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父亲Albert拿走了我父亲挣的钱，并用这些钱支付了家庭开支。
这可能会增加日常开支。

examination_example.sentence: Whether you're looking at wallpaper or paint, the time, effort and relative <highlight>expense</highlight> put into it are significant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管你是在看墙纸还是油漆，花在上面的时间、精力和相关费用都是很重要的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (at the expense of)在牺牲...的情况下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 花费不多的；便宜的

word_family.mean: n. 代价；价钱；费用；开销；花费；需要花钱的东西

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 以…为代价；在…受损害的情况下；以致忽视了…

sense_info_list.en: the cost required for something; the money spent on something

examination_example.sentence: After almost 6 to 7 years，Tom was unable to pay for all the household <highlight>expenses</highlight> (家庭开支)，even the basic necessities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将近 6 到 7 年之后，汤姆无力支付所有的家庭开支，甚至连基本必需品也付不起。

examination_example.sentence: Why was Tom unable to pay for all the household <highlight>expenses</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么汤姆无法支付所有的家庭开支？

examination_example.sentence: Teens lack sleep because of after-school jobs that are taken on to earn extra money for college，family <highlight>expenses</highlight>，or simply for clothes．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青少年睡眠不足是因为放学后的工作是为了赚取额外的大学费用、家庭开支或仅仅为了买衣服。

sense_info_list.zh: (at the expense of)在牺牲...的情况下

examination_example.sentence: To sum up，studies are really very important，but never at the <highlight>expense</highlight> (代价) of students’ physical and mental well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，学习真的很重要，但绝不会以牺牲学生的身心健康为代价。
